# ForceMode.force

**Case**

A constant force or torque applied to a body, influencing motion over time.

## Declaration

```swift
case force
```

## Discussion

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setForce(_:index:)] has the units of mass * distance /  time^2. i.e. a force ( mass * acceleration ). `force` mode causes a change in acceleration that varies proportionally to a body’s mass.

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setTorque(_:index:)] has the units of mass * distance^2 / time^2. `force` mode causes a change in angular acceleration that varies proportionally to a body’s mass and inertia.
